settings.title: Shipping details
settings.body:
We can ship worldwide. Our website will automate shipping across Canada and to the United States. Please contact us if you would like a shipping quote.

For more information, please review our shipping policy.

settings.title: Delivery details
settings.subtitle: Question subtitle
settings.body:
Let your customers know if you offer free delivery for certain types of orders

Link to your offers page.

settings.title: Returns details
settings.body:
For damaged items, please contact us so we can work determine the next steps. Depending on your location and product, we will arrange for someone local to repair the item or offer a full exchange of the item. If you are returning something because you have changed your mind, we will have the item shipped back to our showroom as long as it is in its original box and unopened. Unfortunately, we do have to charge a 25% re-stocking fee on full returns for furniture items. For home decor and smaller accessories, the item must be in its original box and unopened.

Link to our returns policy.

settings.title: Do you have a showroom?
settings.subtitle: Yes!
settings.body: Yes - our showroom is located in London, Ontario at 762 Dundas Street.

settings.title: Do you ship to the United States?
settings.subtitle: Yes!
settings.body: We ship across all of North America. If you would like to purchase vintage furniture and are located outside of ourshipping map, pleasecontact usÂ for a shipping quote.

settings.title: Do you buy vintage furniture?
settings.subtitle: Yes!
settings.body: We do! We specifically purchase Scandinavian / Danish Modern furniture dating all the way back to the 1950-1960s. If you have something that you think fits our criteria, please contact us with more information about your piece.

settings.title: Do you have a trade program?
settings.subtitle: Yes!
settings.body: Yes! We work with many different design professionals - please contact us to begin your application.

settings.title: Can I view swatches before purchasing?
settings.subtitle: Absolutely!
settings.body: Absolutely - we have fabric and wood swatches available in our showroom for all of our products.

settings.title: Is the furniture you sell sustainable?
settings.body: Our story began by selling vintage furniture - we firmly believe that it is wasteful to dispose of products that are perfectly okay, or that can be restored as new. All of our new furniture is manufactured environmentally responsibly, including the materials that are used.

settings.title: How long do your products take to ship?
settings.body: Each product is shipped depending on its availability, location and whether or not it is made to order. All of our estimated delivery times are noted on each of the product pages.

settings.title: I need assistance selecting furniture - can you help?
settings.subtitle: Absolutely.
settings.body: Definitely - we have an in-house design team that can assist in person, and virtually. You can review our design services, or contact us to get started on a design package.
